text:
appreciating <@UAUCGGD6C>  for `argmax(f, xs)`  after at least 18 months of debate
<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/issues/27613>
The changes where you have to go through that are the hardest
so I really appreciate when people pull it off.

text: Yes, that’s wonderful to have; what a surprising schlep that was. Also very grateful for the perseverance

more than once
